Class UserController

java.lang.Object
ajbc.doodle.calendar.controllers.UserController
@RequestMapping("/users") @RestController public class UserController extends Object
controller that implements the API for Users

      @RequestMapping(method=POST, path="/addlist") public org.springframework.http.ResponseEntity<?> addUsers(@RequestBody List<ajbc.doodle.calendar.entities.User> users)
      add a list of users to db
      Parameters:
      users - the list of users
      Returns:
      the list of users with ids, error if failed

      Returns:

    • getUsers

      @RequestMapping(method=GET) public org.springframework.http.ResponseEntity<?> getUsers(@RequestParam Map<String,String> map)
      get users by request params eventId: get all users that are part of the event with id eventId email: get the user with the given email startTime, endTime: get all users that have en event in the range of startTime to endTime no param: get all users
      Parameters:
      map - the map of request params
      Returns:
      the list of the required users, error if failed

      Parameters:
      user - the updated user object
      id - the id of the user

    • subscribe

      @PostMapping("/subscribe/{email}") @ResponseStatus(CREATED) public org.springframework.http.ResponseEntity<?> subscribe(@RequestBody ajbc.doodle.calendar.entities.webpush.Subscription subscription, @PathVariable(required=false) String email) throws InvalidKeyException, com.fasterxml.jackson.core.JsonProcessingException, NoSuchAlgorithmException, InvalidKeySpecException, InvalidAlgorithmParameterException, NoSuchPaddingException, IllegalBlockSizeException, BadPaddingException
      subscribe (login) user to receive push messages sets the user as logged in
      Parameters:
      subscription - subscription data sent from the browser
      email - the user email
      Returns:
      success message, error if failed
      Throws:
      InvalidKeyException
      com.fasterxml.jackson.core.JsonProcessingException
      NoSuchAlgorithmException
      InvalidKeySpecException
      InvalidAlgorithmParameterException
      NoSuchPaddingException
      IllegalBlockSizeException
      BadPaddingException

    • unsubscribe

      @PostMapping("/unsubscribe/{email}") public org.springframework.http.ResponseEntity<?> unsubscribe(@RequestBody ajbc.doodle.calendar.entities.webpush.SubscriptionEndpoint subscription, @PathVariable(required=false) String email)
      unsubscribe (logout) user from push messages sets the user as logged out
      Parameters:
      subscription - end point from browser
      email - the user email
      Returns:
      success message, error if failed

    • isSubscribed

      @PostMapping("/isSubscribed") public boolean isSubscribed(@RequestBody ajbc.doodle.calendar.entities.webpush.SubscriptionEndpoint subscription) throws ajbc.doodle.calendar.daos.DaoException
      checks if a user is currently subscribed to push messages by checking endpoint
      Parameters:
      subscription - end point from browser
      Returns:
      true if a user is subscribed, false otherwise
      Throws:
      ajbc.doodle.calendar.daos.DaoException
